message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than your assessment. My initial offer is $15,000. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to counter.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $15,000 is way above my budget. I'm interested in the product but I'm only willing to pay $10,000.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. I would like to make a counteroffer at $12,500. This price reflects the value I place on the product and aims to bridge the gap between our previous offers. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's my absolute top offer. Let me know if you're able to accept that.

I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I am willing to consider $11,500 as a final offer. This price reflects a compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit for us. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.
